channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Ainsley's Good Mood Food
channel.desc: A dose of greens is sure to make you feel good, and Ainsley's dishes - which include a fresh chicken and spring vegetable casserole - are packed with them this time.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Chase
channel.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as four strangers - Craig from Glasgow, David from London, Jo from Cheshire and Anoushka originally from Surrey - come together in the hope of beating a Chaser.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Cooking with the Stars
channel.desc: Emma Willis and Tom Allen host as Natalie Cassidy, Jack Osbourne, Jordan North, Shaun Wright-Phillips, Hugh Dennis and Kelly Hoppen compete in the show's first six-way battle. S5 Ep3.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Jimmy and Shivi's Farmhouse Breakfast
channel.desc: Candice Brown: Bake Off royalty Candice Brown joins Jimmy and Shivi at the farm for a berry slump while Jimmy meets Charles the iguana at the wildlife park. S2 Ep19.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world as well as the latest major sports results.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: James Martin's Saturday Morning
channel.desc: James is joined by singer Louise Redknapp while tasting mouth-watering recipes from chefs Francesco Mazzei and Tom Shepherd and cooking nettles with Alysia Greenwood. S8 Ep22.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Ainsley's Fantastic Flavours
channel.desc: South Asia: Ainsley explores the flavours of South Asia - known for its colourful and exciting cuisine - as guests Lisa Snowdon and Donna Preston cook their favourite dishes. S2 Ep8.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Tom Kerridge Cooks Spain
channel.desc: Crayfish and Melons: Chef Tom Kerridge journeys from Extremadura to Murcia to discover the secrets behind crayfish and melons before cooking up delicious dishes that celebrate them. S1 Ep5.

channel.title: ITV Lunchtime News
channel.desc: The latest headlines from around the world at lunchtime with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents, all of which are followed by a national weather forecast.
